verse: स ऐक्षत यदि वा इममभिमस्ये कनीयोऽन्नं करिष्य इति। स तया वाचा तेनात्मनेद सर्वमसृजत यदिदं किंचर्चो यजूषि सामानि छन्दासि यज्ञान्प्रजाः पशून्। स यद्यदेवासृजत तत्तदत्तुमध्रियत। सर्वं वा अत्तीति तददितेरदितित्व सर्वस्येतसात्ता भवति सर्वमस्यान्नं भवति य एवमेतददितेरदितित्वं वेद॥
meaning: Meaning:He saw if I shall consume this smaller food or I shall make it bigger. With that speech, he himself created everything, including a little part in the Rigveda, Samaveda, and the verses and sacrifices, as well as living beings and animals. He who created the gods did not dare to eat what he created. Everything eats that, and Aditi is the eater of everything. Everything becomes the food for everything, and he who knows Aditi thus knows the world.
